column4: Not all Windows software have better alternatives on linux. I really miss AIRoboform. Anyone using better password manager on ubuntu ? probaby with firefox.
thats a subjective opinions, i use revelation, and its much better than anything ive used in windows
Hey buddy thanks for revelation. I found an older version in repository not having any tray applet :(  Do you enter Site address, username and passwords manually ?
Your welcome. At the moment thats what i do becuase i use it for more than just web passwords. You may be able to do it automatically, or another tool will, but i;m not fmaily with them sorry.
